title: Conscious Parenting - Featuring Natasha Nelson
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by Certified Positive Discipline Educator and Founder of Supernova Momma, Natasha Nelson. We discuss using presence, engagement and mindfulness to drive our parenting choices.

More information on Natasha Nelson:
Website - supernovamomma.com
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/supernova_momma
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SupernovaMomma
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SupernovaMomma

Conscious Parenting booklist:
https://padlet.com/supernovamomma/re746i2dwuur7p4p

Black Business of the Week - https://www.jewelcrestjoshuatree.com

NAACP Image Awards - Saturday, February 26th at eight seven central on BET: Anthony Anderson hosts the 53rd NAACP Image Awards. This year’s celebration of Black Excellence salutes the best and brightest in film, TV, music, literature, and activism. Nominees include Silk Sonic, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish, Tarana Burke, Misty Copeland, Will Smith, and many more. For updates on special award honorees, performers and more, visit https://www.bet.com
